file_content.text: Private. I hear you've refused to go back into the field. Explain yourself.
Have you seen those bugs? Twice my size, claws like guillotines, covered in slime....
Colicoids, sir. Native creatures, very hostile. This soldier was the only survivor from his squad.
You can see he's still in shock. The crews that recovered the bodies tell me it was quite grisly.
Stim him up if you have to. He's an Imperial soldier. These Colicoids must be destroyed.
